fuel_can.shop_description: That is a standard unit of fuel used for your average spaceship.

food_ration.extra_description: May be eaten by crew members while travelling to their next location to recover health.
food_ration.shop_description: Ah, that is just a standard food ration. Nothing fancy.

crowbar.extra_description: Used to force open doors that are stuck.

blowtorch.extra_description: Used to cut apart any door that won't open.
blowtorch.shop_description: A blowtorch such as this is great for cutting tough things apart. I have heard that some people use it to explore abandoned buildings.

knife.shop_description: That's a regular knife. Not the sharpest, but you can still cut things with it.

bat.shop_description: You would normally use one of these to hit balls in a game of sport. I guess you could hit other things with it too.

sword.shop_description: A quite priced possesion of mine. If you're going somewhere with danger, then you definitely want this sword to defend yourself!

medkit.extra_description: Used to recover some health of the user.
medkit.shop_description: Well, if you're hurt, then you can use a medkit to patch up your wounds. Really good if you're going somewhere dangerous!

black_orb.extra_description: A mysterious object that when used, might change the user in some way.

four_leaf_clover.extra_description: A mysterious object said to bring luck to whoever finds it.

odd_hand_mirror.extra_description: Some sort of artifact in the shape of a hand mirror. Might change whoever looks into it.

cursed_nail.extra_description: A large and rusted nail. While dented and fragile, it also has a menacing air around it.
